title: Fennel Sweet Essential Oil
description: Relieve the discomfort of cramping and revive the look of dull skin with this natural, undiluted oil.
cleaned_text: Fennel Sweet gets its name from the Latin word for hay. Thought to encourage stamina, this aromatic oil was historically used to enhance strength and courage in warriors.Uses of Fennel Sweet Essential Oil SpainHistory and Background Ancient writings show that fennel was used by the Egyptians, Greeks, Romans, Indians, and Chinese. In Chinese medicine, stimulates Qi of the stomach and chest and relates to the earth element. For emotional healing, promotes clarity, perseverance, reliability and assertiveness.Physical Description Pale yellow to colorless in appearance.Aromatic Description This oil's aroma is sweet, Sweet is extracted by steam distillation, usually of seeds.Information for Aromatherapists It blends well with bergamot, cardamom, coriander, cypress, geranium, ginger, grapefruit, juniper, lavender, lemon, marjoram, pepper black, peppermint, rosemary, sandalwood, spearmint, ylang ylang. Our Fennel Sweet essential oil is 100% pure and natural. It is free of any chemicals, pesticides, synthetic perfumes, fillers, or carrier oils.Cautions We've made it easier for you to get your favorite products, delivered straight to your home with our new subscription service. And, save when you do! Now available! Our new natural and clean men's skin care, shaving, and grooming products are formulated using botanicals, essential oils, and seaweed.
